name: Notex
description: A simple web app to manage your notes. It is a single page application with a simple UI, a simple backend and database, and with concepts as authentication, CRUD operations, dark mode, responsive design and more.

name: Shanti E-Shop
description: A simple ecommerce (with all the main operations) web app with a simple UI, a simple backend and database, and with concepts as authentication, CRUD operations, dark mode, responsive design and more.
